data.title: 12. William the Lion
data.meta_description: The casual elegance of this suite is reminiscent of a country estate and is reflected in the Highlands Building. Located within a short walking distance of  ...
data.text:
The casual elegance of this suite is reminiscent of a country estate and is reflected in the Highlands Building. Located within a short walking distance of the castle, this suite offers soft lighting and a soothing floral motif. The cozy dining nook is a perfect place to enjoy a cup of morning coffee or a quick snack, or relax in the outdoor hot tub. This suite is not within the Castle.

William the Lion is capable of adjoining to Robert the Bruce (center doorway) and the Bright Suite (through adjoining stairs). To open the doors please arrange with the front desk.

William the Lion does allow one pet (dogs only) up to 50 pounds, for an additional fee of $50, per night and a $100 deposit. To add a pet, please call the front desk.

Why we love this suite

Wine red walls and 2 person jacuzzi tub/shower.

Room Features
